title: 1.7.10整合包删了几个mod然后……
author: mineconan
txt_content:
能运行整合包，但是有时新建一个世界就会崩溃


---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I bet Cylons wouldn't have this problem.

Time: 18-5-27 下午12:43
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1

replies.author: yyk419476391
replies.txt_content:
mineconan 发表于 2018-6-2 21:07
说起来我这里只有ruins mod
那就是这MOD导致的

replies.author: mineconan
replies.txt_content:
对了，再进去那个世界也会崩溃
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
